idea:
The Company "Farms Deck Private Limited" is the producer of high quality farm products. The Company is located in Nasik, which is known as for cultivating internationally acclaimed table and wine variety grapes. 


Set up in 2017, Farms Deck plays a major and fundamental role in trade and nutritioning. Asia’s fondness to fresh produce has led us to deliver best outcome of health & satisfaction to our customers and collaborate only with the best producers. Farm Deck is one of the leading exporters from Nasik supplying to Europe, Russia, middle &Far East. Indian grapes are available in varieties as Thompson seedless, Flame seedless & black (Sharad) seedless. The availability of grapes in India is from January to April, with some early colour varieties also available in December.


The careful selection of our producers has developed over the years, and now we can proudly affirm that we reached a considerable potential regarding quality and quantity of our products. We export grapes from certified global gap farms.


We cherish established relationships with our importers & offer the best in terms of services, quality reliability and terms. Grape exports to European countries begin late in January while exports to Russia, Far East, Dubai, Sri Lanka, China, Thailand, Singapore, Hong Kong and other places begin in December.
name: FARMS DECK PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

We enable this via our :

name: THINQ ON PURPOSE

idea: Pureblu is a techplatform that aggregates airconditioning service providers and offer seemless services and energy management solutions to its customers . It also aims to offer airconditioning on a pay per use model which would make airconditioning accessible to every Indian.

idea: The startup deals with providing consultancy on the lifestyle changes of an individual by mapping their genes. Each and every individual is different and by mapping the genes of an individual we can come to know about important information of an individual. By knowing this important information, we can suggest lifestyle changes to an individual through which a person can benefit to the most. There is a vast plethora of the lifestyle changes that can be made for an example the intolerancy to gluten or lactose. The other examples include better quality of hair, skin and nails. Pre determining the vulnerability to certain diseases like diabetes and cancer. Weight loss programmes related to metabolism. There are numerous ways in which the life of an individual can be improved by changing their lifestyles based in their genetic information.
name: GeneOm

idea: We take great pleasure in introducing ourselves as startup organization engaged in supplying & installation wide range of Fire Protection Equipment & Protection Accessories. We supply and service all types of Fire Extinguishers & Fire Fighting Appliances, Equipment’s. We specialization in designing solutions in the field of Building Management, Fire Detection / Suppression and carries out turnkey system installations.
name: JYOTI FIRE SERVICES LLP

idea:
At eduraion we are trying to bring everyone involved in the education ecosystem a little closer. We want to cater to everyone who contributes to education, from parents to teachers to students and educational institutions. With the help of technology, we strive to give students access to quality education wherever they want. For teachers we offer a platform to spread their precious knowledge to millions of students in India.


A brain-child of Raion Retail Pvt Ltd, Eduraion came into existence after witnessing grim problems faced by engineering students. From being flooded with assignments to lack of quality teachers there were multiple hindrances in their way.


E-learning courses are our expertise and we offer the best online coaching. We bring to you some of the best professors who will be curating learning material for all the courses, making your learning process a swift, effective, and hassle-free journey.
name: RAION RETAIL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Original ideas / dreams being fulfilled in unique way
name: Originals
